name: Lights of the Automata
description:
Slide around on the hills and destroy the enemy towers. But don't get caught by the evil robot scouts!

This game is still an early version, I want to make a more complete version later with a new enemy type and a tutorial. It's still playable though, so you should definetely give it a shot :).

Controls:

  • WASD+Mouse
  • Left click to shoot, hold to charge
  • Hold right click to slide on ground, Tribes style
  • Hold space for jetpack
  • F to launch power bomb (high splash damage, destroy towers with it (and maybe launch yourself???)

Featuring music by Ross Budgen https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQKGLOK2FqmVgVwYferltKQ
